item.title: iOS 26.2—Apple Confirms Critical Update For 1 Billion iPhones
item.description: Apple's update is finally here — and it includes urgent fixes.

item.title: Apple Confirms iPhone Attacks—All Users Must Update Now
item.description: 1 billion users warned to update to iOS 26.2 now.

item.title: OpenAI, Disney, And The Friction Deficit That Redefines Storytelling
item.description: What the OpenAI Disney deal reveals about storytelling, attention, and the friction required for brands, and myths, to remain meaningful.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Sunday, December 14
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Google Issues Critical ‘No Password Required’ Attack Warning
item.description: The Google Threat Intelligence Group has now confirmed widespread and ongoing attacks using no-password-required malware.
